definition: to escape the cold by going on a winter holiday
to avoid/to shun/to flee/to escape/to keep away from/to leave/to hide from

sentences.english: Cuckoos that summer in Europe also head to Africa to avoid the winter.
sentences.chinese: 那個夏天歐洲的杜鵑也飛往非洲避寒。

sentences.english: E. g. They wintered in Florida.
sentences.chinese: 他們在佛羅里達州避寒。

definition: to be away for the summer holidays/to spend a holiday at a summer resort/to prevent sunstroke
to defend against the cold/to keep warm
cold weather, frozen ground (idiom); bitterly cold
to take shelter from the wind/to lie low/to stay out of trouble
four seasons like spring/favorable climate throughout the year
to stay warm/to protect against the cold
lit. to avoid the wind/fig. to keep low to avoid a difficult situation/to stay out of trouble
to warm oneself (by a fire etc)
